name: Harvest Heist (Sheepolution)
description:
A bandit trio has a devious plan to become rich. They will steal vegetables from a farmer.

Now, I know what you’re thinking.

“Isn’t that dangerous? What if they get caught!”

Your concern is appreciated, but fear not, for our friends have disguised themselves. Not even the most experienced farmer will notice the difference between them and an actual vegetable. Once they are underground, that is.

Despite this 200 IQ precaution, the mission won’t be without risks. It just so happens to be that they are messing with the biggest and angriest farmer in the country. Once he notices one of his vegetables missing, he will start tracking you down in no time.

Can you outsmart the farmer and fulfill the dream of this trio to become rich?

Controls
Arrow keys + X/C or J/K
Movement - Arrow Keys
Harvest - X / J
Hide - C / K
Confirm - X / J / Enter / Spacebar

Credits
Code - Sheepolution
Art - Shores & Sheepolution
Music - Makkeraad
